Package eatree.model

Class EatreeModel

java.lang.Object
eatree.model.EatreeModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEatreeModel
public class EatreeModel extends Object implements IEatreeModel
The game implementation of Eatree. This class is the model of the game. It can be either used in combination with a view+controller or directly through the JShell.

  • Method Details

    • gameisOver

      public boolean gameisOver()
      Checks if game is over under several circumstances. 1. If player collides / crashes with branch, game over. 2. If the time runs out, also game over.
      Specified by:
      gameisOver in interface IEatreeModel
      Returns:
      true if game is over, false if still running.

    • chopTree

      private void chopTree()

    • move

      public EatreeModel move(String direction)
      Essential method for the game. Moves player to left or right.
      Specified by:
      move in interface IEatreeModel
      Parameters:
      direction - String "left" or "right". If any other string is entered, the system will ask the user to give only left or right.
      Returns:
      game instance (useful for jshell)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      A textual representation about the current game state.
      Specified by:
      toString in interface IEatreeModel
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      information on the game state (score and symbols that represents the game state).

    • writeSaveData

      public void writeSaveData(int score)
      Writes and saves data to a file named scores.txt saved in the project's directory.
      Specified by:
      writeSaveData in interface IEatreeModel
      Parameters:
      score - score achieved by the player at the end of a game session

    • loadScores

      public void loadScores()
      Loads best score from scores.txt file. Unfortunately this part is still not perfect. If run from another computer, it is necessary to change the directory first before running the game to avoid exceptions. The expected directory is where scores.txt is stored in your computer.
      Specified by:
      loadScores in interface IEatreeModel
